thoughts.text: To develop a user-friendly, mobile-friendly web app, I need to set up the development environment, select the appropriate technologies, create a project plan, and start building the app.
thoughts.reasoning: Setting up the development environment and creating a project plan are essential steps to start developing the web app.
thoughts.plan:
- Set up the development environment
- Select the appropriate technologies
- Create a project plan
- Start building the app
thoughts.criticism: I need to ensure that I choose the most suitable technologies for the web app and create a detailed project plan to stay organized and on track.
thoughts.speak: To develop a user-friendly, mobile-friendly web app, I need to set up the development environment, select the appropriate technologies, create a project plan, and start building the app.
